fields.fieldText: You cannot create a PO for a completed work order.

validationRule.errorMessage: Description can not be more than 60 characters.

fields.name: NoWOfound
fields.fieldText:
There is no other work order found on this Case.

Please populate the Subject and Description for the new work order created.

fields.name: Note
fields.fieldText: Note: The purchase order will be attached to this new work order.

fields.name: WarningText
fields.fieldText: Start Date cannot be after End Date. Please update Start and End Date.
